DB when you're building an application you want it to run fast and you want it to stay fast as your business grows and
more and more people use your app databases have always been one of the biggest challenges in scaling these
applications most databases just weren't designed to match the scale and performance needs of modern apps as more
and more people use your app and you add more and more web servers the database layer often can't keep up it gets slower
and slower and sometimes fails taking your application down with it you can try to get around this problem by
building a large cluster of databases this can work for a while but it's hard and expensive and requires a lot of
expertise you have to make sure your database keeps running and data isn't lost even if one of your servers goes
down or there's a problem with one of your data centers you have to know what to do if your application grows so fast that your
cluster is no longer big enough and you have to make sure your databases are running the latest software and be ready
to patch or upgrade the software without shutting down your business what if you could replace all this complex software
and Hardware with a database service designed from the ground up to support the low latency High throughput
requirements of today's high-scale applications introducing Amazon Dynamo
DB a high performance non-relational data based service built for the cloud
Dynamo DB is very easy to use you can forget about all the problems that come with managing your own software and
infrastructure that's because Dynamo DB isn't database software it's a database service that handles all of this for you
you just tell the service how many requests it needs to be able to handle per second and it does the rest
automatically then when your application really takes off and your database now needs to be able to handle thousands or
even hundreds of thousands of more requests what do you do you just dial in the scale that you want and that's it we
automatically spread your data across enough Hardware to provide consistent performance and to protect against
downtime an Amazon Dynamo DB isn't just easy to use it's also really really fast
instead of using traditional hard drives your data is stored on solid state drives for fast access to your data in
addition to being fast Dynamo DB is also extremely reliable we automatically replicate your data across multiple AWS
availability zones to protect your data and to provide High uptime plus Dynam DB's synchronous replication
architecture protects your database from Hardware failures in any individual node and you can get started with Dynamo DB
for free so when you're ready to take your database to Cloud scale visit our website and sign up for the free tier of
service [Music]
